<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Comparison function for Option strings (option names &amp; prefixes).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The ordering is &#42;almost&#42; case-insensitive lexicographic, with an exception.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#39;\\0&#39; comes at the end of the alphabet instead of the beginning (thus options</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// precede any other options which prefix them). Additionally, if two options</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are identical ignoring case, they are ordered according to case sensitive</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ordering if &#96;FallbackCaseSensitive&#96; is true.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a248812e85a9459eea4bb1a402bd59abc">StrCmpOptionName</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlight">                     </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FallbackCaseSensitive = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
